title: Bank of America Mobilized and Deployed $250 Billion in Sustainable Finance Capital in 2021 - PR Newswire

description: /PRNewswire/ -- Bank of America announced today that it mobilized and deployed approximately $250 billion in sustainable finance activity for 2021, an all-time...
